en.description: Communal spaces and amenities for residential development projects

spaces.spatial_considerations: storage and ventilation, water connection and hygiene

spaces.spatial_considerations: water connection, reduce noise disturbance and provide drying space

spaces.name: Playroom
spaces.calculation: 2m2 per child (1 in 11 Dutch people is 4-12 years old)

spaces.name: Workspace
spaces.calculation: number of residents can double with dual use

spaces.name: Community Room
spaces.spatial_considerations: flexibility in use, management and possible sanitary facilities

spaces.name: Babysitting Space

spaces.spatial_considerations: sanitary facilities, cleaning, note childcare regulations
